hicpp-signed-bitwise.description:
Description

Finds uses of bitwise operations on signed integer types, which may lead to
undefined or implementation defined behavior.

The according rule is defined in the
High Integrity C++ Standard, Section 5.6.1
.
hicpp-signed-bitwise.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
IgnorePositiveIntegerLiterals
If this option is set to
true
, the check will not warn on bitwise operations with positive integer literals, e.g.
~0
,
2 << 1
, etc.
Default value is
false
.
